SELECT count(0) FROM lt_order o LEFT JOIN lt_user u on o.user_id=u.id
where o.order_sn like concat('%', #{params.w},'%') or o.receipt_name like concat('%', #{params.w},'%') or o.receipt_phone like concat('%', #{params.w},'%')

SELECT oi.id,oi.goods_id as goodsId,oi.num,oi.user_id as userId,oi.add_time as addTime,oi.order_id as orderId,oi.price as buyPrice, g.title,g.def_img as defImg,g.price_market as priceMarket from lt_order_item oi LEFT JOIN lt_goods g on oi.goods_id=g.id where oi.order_id=#{orderId}
